extensionDescription.message: Allows exporting messages and folders for FindNow

options.emlexportsub_hint.message: The email will only be stored in the subfolder specified here if it already exists. If the subfolder does not exist, the email will be saved directly to the folder selected when the email is filed.

options.editsubject.message: Subject can be changed with extra dialog

options.movetotrash.message: After storing, move the email to the trash

dialog.editsubject.subject.message: Please indicate your change in the subject:

dialog.editsubject.move_to_trash.message: After storing, move the email to the trash
